title: Travel Cost of the China-Japan Standoff: 1900 Flights Scrapped and More
description: Japan had been preparing for a strong winter, particularly in regions dependent on ski tourism. Instead, airlines are downsizing aircraft and trimming frequencies. With political tensions still high and no sign of policy easing, the travel freeze could stretc…
content: More than 1,900 flights from mainland China to Japan have been canceled for December, wiping out over 40% of scheduled services for the month. Its one of the clearest signs yet that the political fre… [+757 chars]
